about_the_game:
The crazy and hardcore game is a parody. The great hero Medved Hellraiser returns again to please the player with trash, cringe and frenzy! This time the developers pushed the great hero straight into the universe of the Green Elephant! You have to fight Pakhom Poekashchiy and Brother Epifan, and also save the world from the main villain of this game - Gill Bates - an evil genius who decided to perform anal chipping on all of humanity! Medved Hellraiser 3: Green Elephant is a 3D first-person shooter where you have to fight monsters, gopniks, debt collectors and homeless people! Among the innovations, we can note the system for purchasing weapons and ammunition: earn stars and buy new weapons and ammunition to defeat powerful bosses! The game is quite hardcore, but you can choose the desired difficulty right before the battle. Also, special conditions appeared in battles, for example: kill enemies only with Headshots, or use only an ax. In addition, even a scroller level has been introduced, where the player, together with the Colonel, will have to ride White Horses, right to Gill Bates' base!

-Nice graphics!
-Famous characters - memes!
-Hardcore and interesting gameplay!
-Ability to clean the toilet!
-Humor, frenzy!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains obscene language, blood and head separation after headshots.

The crazy and hardcore game is a parody. The great hero Medved Hellraiser returns again to please the player with trash, cringe and frenzy! This time the developers pushed the great hero straight into the universe of the Green Elephant! You have to fight Pakhom Poekashchiy and Brother Epifan, and also save the world from the main villain of this game - Gill Bates - an evil genius who decided to perform anal chipping on all of humanity! Among the innovations, we can note the system for purchasing weapons and ammunition: earn stars and buy new weapons and ammunition to defeat powerful bosses! Also, special conditions appeared in battles, for example: kill enemies only with Headshots, or use only an ax. In addition, even a scroller level has been introduced, where the player, together with the Colonel, will have to ride White Horses, right to Gill Bates' base!

name: Medved Hellraiser 3: Green Elephant

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: i3 10100, Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050TI (minimal settings low Resolution)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: i3 12100, Ryzen 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580, 1660TI
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 3D first-person shooter where you have to fight monsters, gopniks, debt collectors and homeless people!
